core_principles: Fusion over Imitation: Clinical Precision x Fintech Speed
Content is King: Data legibility is the primary aesthetic
Negative Space: High macro-spacing (p-8+), High micro-density (tables)
No Gradients: Flat, solid, authoritative colors
anti_patterns: No centered text for headings or cards

buttons.primary: bg-slate-900 text-white hover:bg-slate-800 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-white border border-slate-200 text-slate-700 hover:bg-slate-50 rounded-md px-4 py-2 font-medium transition-all
buttons.ghost: bg-transparent text-slate-600 hover:bg-slate-100 hover:text-slate-900 rounded-md px-3 py-2 transition-all
buttons.destructive: bg-red-50 text-red-600 hover:bg-red-100 border border-red-100 rounded-md px-4 py-2 transition-all

cards.style: bg-white border border-slate-200 rounded-lg shadow-sm hover:shadow-md transition-shadow duration-200

inputs.style: flex h-10 w-full rounded-md border border-slate-200 bg-white px-3 py-2 text-sm ring-offset-white file:border-0 file:bg-transparent file:text-sm file:font-medium placeholder:text-slate-500 focus-visible:outline-none focus-visible:ring-2 focus-visible:ring-slate-900 focus-visible:ring-offset-2 disabled:cursor-not-allowed disabled:opacity-50

tables.header: h-12 px-4 text-left align-middle font-medium text-slate-500 [&:has([role=checkbox])]:pr-0

medical_abstract.usage: Subtle background for cards or banners

universal_guidelines: DO NOT use gradients for backgrounds.
DO NOT center align text in cards or headers. Left align is standard.
Use 'IBM Plex Sans' for all body text.
Tables must be dense and information-rich.
Primary action buttons must be solid Slate-900.
Secondary actions must be outlined Slate-200.
instructions_to_main_agent: You are building a high-precision medical fintech dashboard. The user is a busy wholesaler. Speed and clarity are paramount. Do not add decorative fluff. Stick to the grid. Use the provided image URLs for the login and empty states. Implement the multi-language switcher in the top right header. Use Shadcn UI components but override the default radius to 'rounded-md' and fonts as specified.
